questions.statement: The government should increase taxes (e.g., higher rates or broader tax base).
The country should increase free-trade agreements and reduce trade barriers.
The government should reduce market regulations and expand a free-market economy.
Civil liberties protections should be expanded even when they conflict with security or order.
Gun control laws should be strengthened to restrict access to firearms.
The death penalty should be retained and used for severe crimes.
Abortion rights should be protected and access should be expanded.
LGBTQ rights should be protected and expanded by law.
Drug legalization (e.g., cannabis) should be expanded and criminal penalties reduced.
Immigration policy should be more permissive (e.g., easier entry/residency).
Policies should actively promote gender equality (e.g., anti-discrimination, affirmative measures).
Voluntary euthanasia should be legalized under strict safeguards.
Nationalism should be encouraged as a core value in education and policy.
Multiculturalism should be promoted and protected in public policy and institutions.
Environmental protection should be prioritized even at the cost of economic growth.
